title: Did Georgian officials stop a bus full of black adults who would vote?
subtitle: Activists have accused Jefferson County officials of racially motivated repression of voters, but officials claim that they were imposing a ban on "political activities" at the Louisville Centre for Older Persons.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: On October 15, 2018, Jefferson County officials stopped a bus full of adults from the district-run Seniors Center from going to vote.
